title: Where can I have my prototype PCB enclosure box manufactured? - Quora

response.answer_text: By far the easiest solution is to select the enclosure before designing the PCB. That way, everything will fit. The next easiest is to make your own using a 3D printer. Next would be to produce 3D drawing using CAD and have it made at a 3D printer house.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Matthew Borg Carr

response.answer_text: I have used https://www.protocase.com They are not cheap, though. You might want to check if there is an off the shelf product that meets your requirements. Start here: https://www.mouser.com/Hammond/Enclosures/Enclosures-Boxes-Cases/_/N-5g3p?P=1z0zldx
